name: Creative Labs GigaWorks T20 Series II 28 W Speakers
Features: [Precision-tuned, two-way speaker design: Enjoy well balanced audio with dedicated tweeters for sharp, detailed highs and robust mid-range drivers for rich, full sound., Woven glass fiber cone driver: Experience rich, clear midrange audio and a broader sound stage., Cloth dome tweeter: Hear crisp, detailed highs with a dedicated tweeter., BasXPort technology for enhanced bass: Enhance the low frequency response without the bulkiness of a subwoofer., Convenient access: Get the bass, treble and volume you want with the easily maneuvered controls. Plus, headphone jack and auxiliary in for easy connections., Hear it on the big screen, Connect the speaker system to your TV or gaming console and enjoy solid audio entertainment.]
